title: Flocks AI
sub_title: Investing together to build the future
cover_p1: Flocks is Vietnam’s first AI Investment platform that will change the way businesses are funded, how everyday people invest, and the way our economy grows.
cover_p2: Join Flocks AI now and help vastly increase access to capital for businesses and passive income-generating investments for everyone. Together we will give new and existing businesses opportunities to reinvigorate and expand the Vietnamese economy.

more_text_p1: To rapidly sign up as many investors as possible Flocks AI will allow the first 10,000 accounts to claim 100,000 Dong each. For this to happen, we first want to launch a major challenge: by giving the first 1000 sign-ups a referral link that will share 1% of Flocks AI revenue for 3 months after the official platform launch. This challenge will create a long-term partnership between the first 1000 investors.
more_text_p2: How can you become a Flocks AI Investor?
more_text_p6: To reward everyone that helps promote and populate Flocks AI, we have developed a list of challenges, leader boards, badges, rewards to make our launch journey profitable for all.
more_text_p7: We are only a few months away from the national launch and we need you to help us along the way. We believe that if we profit you should too so by becoming one of the first one thousand you will receive your free share of Flocks AI income and join creators, entrepreneurs and investors in building a whole new future for Vietnam. Currently, we are looking for influencers, KOLs, motivated creators, inspirational leaders, and team players, we plan to build an industry around you, and becoming a full-time influencer can no longer just be a dream but a reality. It is still early, which means everyone has a fair chance, it all depends on how you perform. Imagine getting paid to do what you do best to influence trends, inform the masses about the next big startups and businesses in Vietnam, all while you manage your flock of birds that drive campaigns and expand the Flocks AI platform. Our early testing results make us optimistic that Flocks AI will connect the first million individual funders in one commonly owned platform that will change Vietnam for generations to come.
more_text_p8: For the first time in our lives, we have a chance to affect a certain outcome, we can make sure that vetted, qualified businesses get funded.
more_text_p9: At Flocks AI, we are obsessed with the idea that technology can let us do something collectively that can change our country for the better and increase individual empowerment and equality of opportunity on a national scale.
more_text_p10: Entrepreneurial progress will lead to unprecedented economic growth. Everyone should have a chance to own a fair share of the future profits of Vietnam’s economic growth from Hà Giang in the north to Ca Mau in the South. The launch of Flocks AI is only the first step on the long road towards this goal.
more_text_p11: If this sounds exciting, join us NOW!
